item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hi, There? I am Jun, a masterâ€™s student at Department of Transdisciplinary Science and Engineering, School of Environment and Society, Tokyo Institute of Technology. communication ambassador of ACM SIGCHI. Favourite quotes: The world is not a desktop. -Mark Weiser I propose to consider the question, ‘Can machines think?’ -Alan Turing Computer science is no more about computers than astronomy is about telescopes. -Edsger Dijkstra Computer science inverts the normal.
